itemDescription: British Army general; Senior British Loan Services Officer in Oman.

wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Jeremy Julian Joseph Phipps  (30 June 1942 – 16 March 2021) was a British Army officer who served as Senior British Loan Services Officer in Oman.

response: # Lieutenant Alan Phipps RN (1915–1942; killed in action on Leros), whose son is Major-General Jeremy Phipps
* 1989–1993 Brigadier Jeremy Phipps (late Queen's Own Hussars)
